data.name: NataliaDominguez_Description
data.value: Natalia Domínguez is an enthusiastic professional translator. She exclusively renders from English into Spanish —her mother tongue— and provides translation services for Business, Finance, IT, Social and Medical Science sectors. Most part of her projects come from the following fields: Finance (financial documents); Journalism (different pieces of news and articles); general texts concerning Medical topics (health insurance documents, medical guides, etc); Technology issues such as manuals and guidelines for different devices. During the course of the last two years so far, she has been collaborating as a volunteer translator for GlobalVoices (an international news website). In addition, she also has experience as ESL teacher as she has been teaching English at all levels for the last two years. Her accomplishments derived through dedicated, focused and innovative work a s well as to strive for improving by permanent training and studying. She strongly believes that curiosity leads to a desirous of unlimited knowledge and constant improvement.

data.name: RominaCastagno_Description
data.value: Romina Castagno is a professional-grade human translator who provides document translation services from English into Spanish. She works with several specialization areas and a wide range of industries: Energy (oil, gas and alternative energy), Business, Software, Environment, Literature, Fashion, Games applications, among others. She has done edition and proofreading (style, grammar, spelling) of translations for companies in India, USA, Europe, and Argentina. Her tasks consist in working with platforms and tools provided by the agency itself, like Trados, Trados Studios 2009, Wordfast and the ones sent/created by clients. She ensures a fast and trustful work done with coworkers of the same working and competence level than her. Romina has been living and traveling to the US for many years to study and work. One of the most recent clients she is working for is the Pharmacopeia in Washington DC. Her traveling experiences helped her to be immersed into the real culture and language usage so she counts on the linguistic skills and abilities necessary to solve your communication needs, thanks to all her years of professional experience and perfect command of the target and source language.

data.name: VaninaFassi_Description
data.value: Vanina Fassi is a professional English-Spanish translator specializing in Medicine, Health Care, Pharmaceutical, and Psychology. Investigating and discovering about different subjects drives her to continually improve her knowledge of the translation industry. She has translated and edited for many different companies within several fields, such as sports, journalism, fashion, to name a few. Building long-term client relationship is essential for her, thus she commits herself to satisfy the clients’ requirements by providing them with accurate and high-quality translations. Besides, an active and enthusiastic attitude allows her to meet the agreed delivery date and work with an open and permanent communication. Having worked as a Project Manager gave her the opportunity to coordinate and monitor other linguists’ work; thereby, she is aware of all the stages involved in the process of translation. Her incessant concern to achieve and exceed client expectations makes her a devoted professional focused on the successful completion of every project. Teaching is another important part of her interests, which is why she teaches English to students of all levels and she also offers training courses in reading-comprehension for undergraduate students. Because of her great passion for the language she is constantly challenging her limits and striving to grow both professionally and personally.

data.name: WhoAreWe_Description
data.value:
As self-motivated professionals, we have set up our own enterprise Re- Make translations where effective communication is our main purpose; and our commitment is to focus on delivering efficient language services. We believe, as detail- oriented linguists, that quality is paramount in the world of translation, and finishing translation assignments on time is an essential part of it.
Re-Make Translations was founded on a simple business premise to complete professional translation services. We offer multiple levels of service based on client needs, ranging from draft/summary translation up to certified translation, featuring our three-step process with a translator, editor, and proofreader, all designed to meet the evolving needs of global businesses. Regular projects include books, graphic novels, brochures, manuals, newsletters, contracts, patents, help files, ad copy, package copy, labels, websites, and multilingual web banners.
As a trustful company, we carefully pair your text to a translator with the appropriate subject matter expertise and background. Competitive Prices and First Class Service, which is our promise to you. In fact, when required, we will send you a detailed quote including a full cost breakdown so you will be delighted by our bills, not shocked.
